raw_body: Dearly beloved wife of S.S. Mathiaparanan, much loved mother of Sumathy, Rajan, Sumanthiran and Savithri, beloved grandmother of Shamanthi, Sanjayan, Shiloh, Shechem and Shalem, the precious daughter of A.V. and Lily Ponnu of Kudathanai, Point Pedro and the much loved sister of the late Devi Nallarulanantham, Alan Jeyarajah (Canada), C.P.
